title: About Me
message:
I would like to further improve my skills and creative thinking in Information Technology & to work with new technological developments in a more standardize working environment. Also believe that I could design a well competent web solution that matches any requirement since I have more than 10 years of experience.

 I would like to work with industry's leading web portals like SharePoint, Drupal and Joomla since I have hands on experience on portals for more than 7 years. Additionally I am capable of developing dynamic web sites on PHP platform and .Net platform.
